mean_en: to tie somebody or something with rope, string, etc. so that they/it cannot move or are held together firmly; to fasten the pages of a book together and put them inside a cover; to force somebody to do something by making them promise to do it or by making it their duty to do it;  to stick together or to make things stick together in a solid mass
sentence: The mummies help to bind each other with the bandage.
sentence_trans: 木乃伊互相帮着绑绷带。
